name: Trucker Parking Reborn 2016 - realistic 18 wheeler Truck Trailer Driving Mania Game
name_original: Trucker Parking Reborn 2016 - realistic 18 wheeler Truck Trailer Driving Mania Game
description:
Trucker Parking Reborn is a new tradition in parking games!
Enjoy a unique Trucker Parking experience! Clear all the levels and be the best trucker driver around. Drive a loaded 18-wheeler truck and try to reach the right parking spot on your first attempt! So are you the real trucker, can you drive fast against the clock while encountering a large amount of obstacles and other vehicles on your way? Real Truck Parking 3D HD is a fun truck driving and parking game

Drive for hours as a real trucker and explore the big and beautiful 3D open world in Truck Driver 3D. In this newest and biggest american truck simulator 3D game of 2016. You can explore the career path of a real american trucker, as a trucker who be delivering important cargo across large and impressive distances. With a large amount of cities to explore, drive around in big rig american trucks.

Trucker Parking Reborn 2016 Features:
- Exciting Truck parking missions
- Realistic game play and graphics
- Amazing missions


Extreme Truck Parking is a 3D Truck simulator game, the game simulates various parking situations that you may encounter in your career as a real trucker. In this 3D truck parking game you can change the overall view of the truck's position in different 3D optic angles. Change the view to birdview to have a good idea how much space is left when you park your truck as a king in this 3D truck parking game. Control the truck with a steering wheel, acceleration and brake pedal. Steer your truck into the right parking spot, put the gear into park and round up your mission as a truck driver in this 3D truck parking game.

Parking a 18 Wheeler requires a huge amount of skill and precision! Most truck drivers cannot cope with the amount off skill needed. As an 18 wheeler truck driver your aim is to park the truck into the marked spaces with as little amount of crashes. See for yourself if you can complete all the levels and if you are the most skilled 18-wheeler truck driver on the world. Sometimes you need to put the 18 Wheeler in reverse to get in the marked position. Are you crazy about 3D parking games, and are you up for a challenge with a big rig 18-wheels truck parking.
